programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: A sailor who lost two siblings -- Marines who were killed in the line of duty -- needs a bone marrow transplant; Bishop returns to Oklahoma for Thanksgiving.

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Ducky is attacked by a man who claims to have information about his half-brother, who died decades earlier; Jake and Bishop talk about their future.

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: A seaman who was prepared to testify before a grand jury is murdered, which leads the team to discover the resurgence of an international human trafficking ring; a storm causes power outages all over the city.

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: An unusual investigation takes place when the body of a murdered deep-sea diver and his suspected co-workers must stay in a decompression chamber for four days.

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Secretary of the Navy Sarah Porter's daughter is kidnapped; NCIS Special Agent Valerie Page, McGee's childhood friend, assists the team with advance tactics training.

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Dr. Cyril Taft finds key evidence when he is assigned to surgical duty for a suspect.

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Personal plans are interrupted when errors are found in what seemed to be a straight-forward, closed case; McGee and Delilah argue whether work should be discussed during dinner.

programme.title: Sue Thomas F.B.Eye
programme.desc: When Sue and the team track the source of a cache of illegal visas, they are disturbed to learn what's really for sale.

programme.title: Sue Thomas F.B.Eye
programme.desc: Sue and the team get word about an upcoming act of ecoterrorism and work with an e-mail mole to prevent it.

programme.title: Sue Thomas F.B.Eye
programme.desc: When Sue goes under cover with a visiting FBI agent, Jack becomes concerned about the man's interest in her.

programme.title: Bull
programme.desc: The DA hires Bull to help convict an infamous drug dealer who murdered a police officer but avoided jail by feigning schizophrenia.

programme.title: Bull
programme.desc: Bull seizes the opportunity to make amends for losing a case that sent an innocent man to prison; Danny is reluctant to work with Cable's replacement.

programme.title: Bull
programme.desc: Bull agrees to help Chunk's daughter when her journalism professor faces jail time for stealing proprietary information from a dating app developer.

programme.title: Bull
programme.desc: Bull helps a doctor who illegally purchased a marijuana-derived oil to treat her patients; the case gets complicated when she is arrested for having intent to distribute.

programme.title: Bull
programme.desc: Bull helps a man who changed his identity after unwittingly assisting in a robbery; Bull must convince the jury that the man has redeemed himself by living an upstanding life for years.

programme.title: Criminal Minds
programme.desc: When Morgan is abducted, the members of the BAU team race against time to find him and save his life.

programme.title: Criminal Minds
programme.desc: The team searches for an unknown subject who takes children while their parents are asleep; Morgan tries to find out who attacked him.

programme.title: Criminal Minds
programme.desc: When an unsub targets the BAU, the team pursues the person who is responsible for the actions.

programme.title: Criminal Minds
programme.desc: Emily looks to the BAU for help when tracking an international serial killer; the BAU deals with Morgan's departure.

programme.title: Criminal Minds
programme.desc: The BAU hunts for an UnSUB who deliberately disfigures victims; Rossi and his ex-wife have an uncomfortable reunion.

programme.title: Criminal Minds
programme.desc: The BAU plays a dangerous cat and mouse game with a convicted serial killer who may have information on the whereabouts of two kidnapped boys.

programme.title: Criminal Minds
programme.desc: Hotch is arrested by a SWAT team and suspected of conspiracy; when the team members scramble to prove Hotch's innocence, they discover a larger plot may be on the horizon.

programme.title: Criminal Minds
programme.desc: New recruit Luke Alvez helps the team capture a killer who escaped from prison with 12 other convicts.

programme.title: FBI
programme.desc: After a key witness and a U.S. marshal are ambushed and killed, Maggie and OA must find the man who leaked the information that led to their murders.

programme.title: FBI
programme.desc: When an illegal arms broker-turned-informant is assassinated, OA assumes his identity and goes under cover to stop the sale of dangerous weapons, with help from Maggie and their former FBI instructor.
